basis

Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • basis.Bot

  • public class Bot
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a bot in the game server. The bot can be playing a game or waiting for a game in the lobby.
    Author:
    Nicolas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private TCPClientCommunicator com
      The communicator used to communicate with the bot.
      private BotDBCallback dbHandler
      The database handler used to manipulate bot data on the database.
      private Game game
      The game in which the bot is currently in.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER 
      private BotMode mode
      The gaming mode of the bot.
      private java.lang.String nick
      The nickname of the bot.
      private int priority
      The priority of the bot in the game manager lobby.
      private double score
      The general score of the bot.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bot(TCPClientCommunicator com, java.lang.String nick, BotMode mode, double score, BotDBCallback dbHandler)
      Creates a new bot.

    • Field Detail

      • LOGGER

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER

      • com

        private TCPClientCommunicator com
        The communicator used to communicate with the bot.

      • nick

        private java.lang.String nick
        The nickname of the bot. The string has to respect some conventions.
        See Also:
        Documentation/protocol/nickspecs.html

      • mode

        private BotMode mode
        The gaming mode of the bot. Defines how the bot will join a game.
        See Also:
        BotMode

      • game

        private Game game
        The game in which the bot is currently in. Is null when the bot isn't in game.
        See Also:
        Game

      • score

        private double score
        The general score of the bot. The bot score is updated after a game.

      • priority

        private int priority
        The priority of the bot in the game manager lobby.

      • dbHandler

        private BotDBCallback dbHandler
        The database handler used to manipulate bot data on the database. Is null for fake bots.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bot

        public Bot(TCPClientCommunicator com,
           java.lang.String nick,
           BotMode mode,
           double score,
           BotDBCallback dbHandler)
        Creates a new bot.
        Parameters:
        com - the communicator used to communicate with the bot.
        nick - the nickname of the bot.
        mode - the gaming mode chosen by the bot.
        score - the current game score of the bot.
        dbHandler - the interface used to call back the database.

    • Method Detail

      • getCommunicator

        public TCPClientCommunicator getCommunicator()
        Gets the communicator used to communicate with the bot.
        Returns:
        the client communicator.

      • isFake

        public boolean isFake()
        Returns whether the bot is a fake bot. A fake bot is a bot created by the server to play with real bots.
        Returns:
        true if the bot is a fake, false otherwise.

      • getNick

        public java.lang.String getNick()
        Gets the nickname of a bot.
        Returns:
        the nickname of the bot.

      • getMode

        public BotMode getMode()
        Gets the gaming mode of a bot.
        Returns:
        the gaming mode of the bot.
        See Also:
        BotMode

      • isInGame

        public boolean isInGame()
        Returns whether the bot is currently playing in a game. A bot which is not in game is waiting for a game.
        Returns:
        true if the bot is in a game

      • getGame

        public Game getGame()
        Gets the game in which the bot is currently playing.
        Returns:
        the game in which the bot is playing OR null if the bot isn't in a game.

      • getScore

        public double getScore()
        Gets the general score of a bot.
        Returns:
        the score of the bot.

      • getPriority

        public int getPriority()
        Gets the priority of a bot.
        Returns:
        the priority of the bot.

      • setMode

        public void setMode(BotMode mode)
        Sets the gaming mode of a bot.
        Parameters:
        mode - the new gaming mode of the bot.
        See Also:
        BotMode

      • setGame

        public void setGame(Game game)
        Sets the game of a bot.
        Parameters:
        game - the game the bot is in.

      • setScore

        public void setScore(double score)
        Sets the general score of a bot. The score is also updated on the database.
        Parameters:
        score - the new score of the bot.

      • incPriority

        public void incPriority()
        Increment the priority of a bot in the game lobby.

      • decPriority

        public void decPriority()
        Decrement the priority of a bot in the game lobby.

      • resetPriority

        public void resetPriority()
        Reset to 0 the priority of a bot.
